answers.answer: Hello,it is usually done by a doctor, or else a trained nurse / technician. It is done out patient and often by neurologists.

Hi there!The nerve conduction test, tests for the normal function of the nerves which is conduction of sensory and motor signals; with the help of small electric currents. The normal function of the nerves could be deranged in a few conditions such as neuropathy, which is also known to occur as a complication of diabetes.Hope this information is helpful.Take care!
